metadata.name: Bi Pride Animated
metadata.description:
Animating the collage I made for Pride 2021, for Pride 2022, as part of Sazon.io. 

Original series text: 
I am currently working on a series – Flower Power Portraits – for people I know and love, facing issues they deal with regularly. I wanted to show how beautiful, inside and out, these people are, despite these issues, using color, flowers and slogans or sentences submitted by the subject.

Bi Pride - Flower Power Series
Melissa Ulto
Digital Art & Poster Art
11" x 17"
coming out: lgbtq+ / ally

As part of her Flower Power Series, Melissa created a Bi Pride poster for Pride 2021. Her posters are for print and also include an animated version.
